Hi there,

  I am a consultant working for a software company who has asked me to
recommend new testing frameworks that will be becoming useful in the era
of web services.

  I've run across test driven development - which appears to be a
process of having developers develop JUnit tests before they write any
code (i.e. document the symantics before you go to implementation)

  I've also run into automated unit testing - which appears to be a
product concept:  reducing the burden of developers creating tests
themselves - companies like Agitar and Parasoft are playing here.

  I would like some feedback: what are the pro's and con's of these
solutions?  Are there other solutions?  What types of companies would
benefit from either of these?  What are the risks or downsides of
using these systems?  Do you recommend either TDD or AUT and why?

  I could really use some intelligent feedback on this topic. 
Appreciate any help you can provide.  Thanks.
